profile.name: Eric David Diaz
profile.title: Full-Stack Developer | NestJs | NextJs | SQL, NoSQL | Auth
profile.location: General Roca, Río Negro Province, Argentina

summary: Full-stack web developer with 2+ years of experience. Mastered in Node.js, Express, NestJs, PostgreSQL, and MongoDB. Skilled in NestJS and passionate about building scalable applications. As a seasoned Teaching Assistant, I empower fellow developers to overcome complexities and foster problem-solving abilities. Dedicated to driving innovation in web development.

experience.description: Assist students in the Full Stack Web Developer career at Henry with their technical and/or administrative difficulties. Provide them with tools for resolving technical problems and work on soft skills.
